titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: CONDOMLESS SEX INDICATOR (RECEPTIVE SEX MALE SAME SEX PARTNERS IN THE LAST THREE MONTHS) - Description

div.p: CONDOMLESS SEX INDICATOR (RECEPTIVE SEX MALE SAME SEX PARTNERS IN THE LAST THREE MONTHS) is the same as attribute CONDOMLESS SEX INDICATOR, for receptive sex with male same sex partners in the last three months.
